long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Group Manager is a powerful and user-friendly Google Chrome extension that enables users to efficiently manage their browser tabs by organizing them into customizable groups. This handy extension not only helps in keeping your browser clean and clutter-free but also makes it easier to manage and access your favorite websites and resources.

Key Features:

Create and customize tab groups with user-defined names.
Add, edit, and delete tab groups as needed.
Easily add new URLs or current tabs to existing groups.
Drag and drop tabs between groups for seamless organization.
Collapse and expand tab groups for a cleaner view and better management.
Open entire tab groups in a single click, creating a new browser group with all the tabs.
Import your current browser tab groups into the extension.
How to Use:

Install the Tab Group Manager extension from the Google Chrome store.
Click on the extension icon to open the Tab Group Manager panel.
Create a new group by typing a group name into the "New Group Name" field and pressing Enter.
Add your current tab to an existing group by selecting the group from the dropdown and clicking the "Add Current Tab" button.
Click on the group name to open all the tabs in that group as a new browser group.
Add URLs to a group by typing the URL into the "Add URL" field within each group and pressing Enter.
Edit group names by clicking the edit icon (pencil) next to the group name and entering a new name.
Delete groups by clicking the delete icon (trash can) next to the group name.
Collapse or expand tab groups by clicking the arrow icon next to the group name.
Drag and drop tabs between groups to reorganize them as needed.
Import your current browser tab groups by clicking the "Add Current Group" button.
With Tab Group Manager, you'll enjoy a more organized browsing experience, enhancing your productivity and reducing the time spent searching for the right tab. Give it a try and experience the difference!
